thread.title: John Geiger
thread.title_full: Freeze Pro Shop reviewed by John Geiger

author: John Geiger
title: John Geiger
text: I was looking for just the right carry-on luggage, but after determining which bag I needed, was unable to find my color choice for a reasonable price from any of the U.S. outlets. Looking further afield, I found Freeze Pro to be one of the few merchants offering the desired bag anywhere, and the price was excellent, so I decided to give them a try. The result: faster delivery than if I'd found it on Amazon and selected free delivery, and tracking was better, too! Looking at the Freeze Pro website, I also discovered a number of other items at great prices which I'll purchase in the future for other excursions. Good to find such selection, pricing, and delivery speed in one shop!
